snippet.title: Dream Tactics | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Dream Tactics is a GBA-styled strategy RPG with cunning card combos and deep character customization. Pick your party, trade cards to create unique playstyles, and outsmart hordes of pillows in turn-based combat to save the Dream World from its inevitable collapse.

Website:
https://www.playdreamtactics.com/

Steam Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1897650/Dream_Tactics/
